column5: Beautifully decorated home on Lake LBJ just 3-4 minutes from BIG water. Located on a no-wake cove near section of lake where the Colorado and Llano come together making it an ideal location to enjoy fishing, boating, skiing or simply relax and enjoy the lake. The town of Kingsland and nearby areas offer popular activities such as a wine tour, 18 holes of golf, horseback riding, ATV trails, visiting a state park, spelunking at Longhorn Caverns.
